job_tasks.phrase: aligning the products in EXIN's certification portfolio are aligned with the needs of the market.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a need to understand market requirements and ensure the products (exams) meet those needs, which is a core aspect of business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: ensure that the products in EXIN's certification portfolio are aligned with the needs of the market.
job_tasks.justification: This statement directly relates to understanding business needs and market alignment for product development.

job_tasks.phrase: review the quality of the exams through item and test analysis.
job_tasks.justification: Test analysis involves processing and evaluating data related to exam performance, which falls under data engineering principles for assessment.

job_tasks.phrase: Translating existing exams to several different languages
job_tasks.justification: Localization of exams involves data transformation and preparation, aligning with data engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: translate internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the process of creating or adapting algorithms, a key part of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions the development and maintenance of algorithms, which is the core of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Once the exam development processes are including generative AI, you can finetune these
job_tasks.justification: Fine-tuning generative AI models is a direct modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: collaborate closely with the Exam Developers to integrate generative AI solutions into our processes.
job_tasks.justification: While collaboration is mentioned, the focus on integrating 'generative AI solutions' implies working with and adapting AI models, which is a modeling activity.

job_tasks.phrase: stay up to date with the latest research and developments in the field of AI and machine learning.
job_tasks.justification: Keeping knowledge updated in AI and ML is essential for effective modeling and applying the latest techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: implementing exam products in various systems.
job_tasks.justification: Implementing products in systems involves software integration and deployment tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: cooperating with third parties in creating, localizing, implementing, and maintaining exam products
job_tasks.justification: Creating, localizing, and implementing products involve software development and integration activities.

While maintenance is part of the ML lifecycle, in this context, it's more about ensuring the algorithms themselves continue to function and comply with standards, rather than the full MLOps pipeline. However, 'maintaining' algorithms can touch upon operational aspects.

job_tasks.phrase: Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions
job_tasks.justification: Identifying, resolving issues, and performing root cause analysis for products are operational tasks focused on maintaining the quality and functionality of the exam products.

collaborate closely with the Exam Developers
coordinate work with the Exam Developers
coordinate work with subject matter experts and cooperating with third parties

Keeping your knowledge in the domain up-to-date

review the quality of the exams through item and test analysis.
Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions
maintaining legal, qualitative, and ethical compliance in the outcomes.
take initiative, lead projects, champion new ideas, and take full responsibility for the quality and success of one's work.
Our organization structure is flat, providing room for your initiatives and ideas

classification.rationale: While the role mentions generative AI and fine-tuning, the primary focus is on developing and maintaining machine learning algorithms and conducting test/item analysis. The emphasis is on the algorithmic side and ensuring compliance and quality, aligning more with traditional ML engineering than building user-facing GenAI applications.
